title: Replatforming | Platform Migration | DXP Migration Agency
content:
# Replatforming | Platform Migration | DXP Migration Agency

Amplify your digital capabilities with specialized digital experience platform migration. Seamlessly and securely migrate your store with certified replatforming agency


Back To Services Replatforming / Migration Overview Fueling immersive digital experiences with convenient replatforming services Break barriers of lousy customer experiences with DXP migration to amplify your business capabilities and digital experiences with the right platform that accelerates growth. Krish, with over 20 years of industry experience, holds the prowess needed to seamlessly replatform your digital business on the leading digital experience platforms.Here is your way to experience the swift and steady DXP migration of your digital store with the best talent and skillset in the industry. Schedule a Call Why DXP Migration is Needed? When you are on a scalability spree, the digital infrastructure of your business works as a backbone, and the stronger it is, the higher you can grow. If you can relate to the bottlenecks listed below, consider digital experience platform migration as a high priority for your business to see ahead, improve your digital experiences, and go further. To outgrow your competition with next-gen features To boost the performance of your operations & reduce TCO To improve your commerce capabilities & security To migrate to a platform that is built for expansion & growth To better comply with extensions & utility partners To offer exceptional shopping experiences to your customers DXP Migration Roadmap With a proven track record of 100+ DXP migrations, we ensure a smooth replatforming to a scalable DXP that fits well with your business objectives and requirements. With zero data loss, optimal security, custom feature and extension integrations, and necessary SEO measures, we do a full-proof migration with a tried-and-tested Operandi. Let's Get Started Our work in action B2C D2C Middle East & Africa Food & Beverage Unlocking the power of safe drinking water leveraging eCommerce View Case Study B2C D2C North America Health & Beauty BioIQ Creating Healthy Customer Experience with Digital Amplification View Case Study B2B APAC Consumer Goods Leading Edge Leading the Way by Leveraging Cutting-Edge Digital Commerce View Case Study B2C D2C APAC Health & Beauty Seniority Serving the Seniors with Unified Digital Commerce View Case Study Frequently Asked Questions What are the advantages of Migration or re-platforming? Make your digital business future-proof with the limitless capabilities of any Digital Experience Platform you choose. Moreover, it helps you outrun the cut-throat competition by enhancing your platform, offering a seamless user journey, improving website performance, and enhancing security. Finally, it provides a better CX, elevating your business and making it resilient to ace this fast-paced digital world. What services are included in DXP migration/re-platforming? Migration or re-platforming a DXP depends on factors such as the complexity of your project and the technicality of features to change. Krish provides end-to-end digital experience platform migration services for your business. We've got you covered from data transfer to integrations, enhancements, security, and more. Our certified experts will ensure the migration process is seamless and your CX stays exceptional. How much does it cost to avail of Migration/re-platforming services? The final cost to avail of Migration/Re-Platforming services depends on your desired digital experience platform, digital bottlenecks, infrastructure capacity, frontend, and desired business outcomes. We are a platform-agnostic digital experience provider and are skilled in offering migration services for leading DXPs. To know more about Krishâ€™s migration/re-platforming services and take a detailed audit, get in touch with us. How long is the process of Migration/re-platforming? The process depends on your business goals, choice of DXP, source technology, required integrations, industry requirements, and compliance standards. Some projects may take 9-15 months. Others might take more. At Krish, we love to have a comprehensive conversation with our clients to understand their requirements and decide the duration accordingly. Get a detailed plan chalked out by our experts to know the tentative TAT to migrate and build a reformed DXP. Why should I hire Krish for my DXP migration/re-platforming services? Krish is a preferred, certified partner for multiple leading platforms, such as Adobe, Adobe Experience Manager, Shopify Plus, commercetools, Salesforce Commerce Cloud, Vtex, and more. We aim to combine people, systems, and data for thorough success for your digital business. We can assist you with all your Migration requirements, issues, and aspirations. Trusted by leading brands
